Serves 6

Apple Crisp

Ingredients

  • 3 cup sliced or chopped apples
  • 1 Tbs. flour
  • 1/4 cup sugar
  • 1 tsp. cinnamon
  • 1/8 tsp. salt
  • 1 Tbs. water
  • 1/2 cup rolled oats
  • 1/4 tsp. salt
  • 1/4 cup margarine
  • 1/3 cup brown sugar

Instructions

  1. Preheat oven to 375F

  2. Combine flour, sugar, cinnamon and 1/8 tsp. salt. Mix with apples and water, and place in a greased casserole pan.

  3. Cut oats, salt, margarine and brown sugar together with a pastry blender.

  4. Sprinkle on top of casserole mixture.

  5. Bake for 35 minutes.

Desserts
